title: [Large-Scale] Utilizing a Pedagogical Taxonomy for Science Learning Activity Design and Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in scientific fields and experience in utilizing Learning Management Systems (LMS)
context.additional_context: Process to enhance practical application competencies through project-based assessment in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design science-based learning activities using a learning object classification system (Conole et al.).
Learners can verify the reliability and validity of the classification system through inter-rater consistency analysis.
Learners can develop and apply project-based assessment tools in an LMS environment to measure practitioner competencies.

resources: Assessment Consistency Analysis Tool (e.g., Cohen's Kappa Calculator)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
